sys_remote_update_set.description:
Use case: A number of generic requests are being submitted that are actually incidents. DCO currently has to close the request and then open an incident in order to track the effort. This also requires a considerable amount of data replication.
Suggestion, as with creating a change from an incident, I would think the same process could be implimented from the request item.
sys_remote_update_set.name: GP_STRY0012214_Be_able_to_convert_ritm's_to_incident
